products.name: Pain de mie extra moelleux
products.labels: FSC, FSC Mix, Hergestellt in der Schweiz
products.facts: ["Made with high-quality wheat flour for a soft texture.","Contains no artificial preservatives, ensuring natural freshness.","Packaged in eco-friendly materials to reduce environmental impact.","Baked using traditional methods to maintain superior quality and flavor."]

products.name: wholemeal sourdough bread
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Plant-based foods, Cereals and potatoes, Breads, Sliced breads, Wholemeal breads, Wholemeal sliced breads
products.labels: Vegetarian, Vegan, European Vegetarian Union, European Vegetarian Union Vegan
products.facts: ["Wholemeal sourdough bread is made from whole grain flour, water, salt, and a natural sourdough starter.","Using wholemeal flour retains the bran and germ, providing more nutrients and fiber compared to white bread.","Sourdough fermentation enhances the bioavailability of nutrients and may improve gut health due to beneficial bacteria.","Wholemeal sourdough bread has a lower carbon footprint compared to industrially produced breads due to its minimal processing and use of local ingredients."]

products.name: Prime Hydration Drink - Tropical Punch
products.categories: Beverages, Artificially sweetened beverages, Hydration drink, Sweetened hydration drink
products.facts: ["Contains electrolytes for hydration support.","Packaged in a 500 mL recyclable bottle.","Free from artificial colors and preservatives.","Made with natural flavors and sweeteners."]

products.name: Light & Free mousse
products.categories: Dairies, Fermented foods, Fermented milk products, Desserts, Dairy desserts, Fermented dairy desserts, Fermented dairy desserts with fruits, fr:Fromages blancs, Fromages blancs with fruits, en:cheeses
products.facts: ["Light & Free mousse is made with high-quality ingredients that are low in fat.","The packaging is designed to be recyclable, promoting sustainability.","It contains no added sugars, making it a healthier dessert option.","Light & Free mousse is produced with a focus on minimizing environmental impact during manufacturing."]

products.name: Mamba
products.facts: ["Mamba is made from high-quality ingredients without artificial colors or flavors.","The packaging is designed to be recyclable, minimizing environmental impact.","Mamba candies are gluten-free, making them suitable for a variety of dietary needs.","The product is manufactured under strict quality control standards to ensure consistency and safety."]

products.name: Original Cream Cheese
products.facts: ["Made from milk and cream, Original Cream Cheese has a rich, creamy texture.","It contains no artificial preservatives, ensuring a more natural product.","The packaging is recyclable, promoting eco-friendly disposal.","Original Cream Cheese is gluten-free, making it suitable for those with gluten sensitivities."]

products.name: Original Unsweetened Almondmilk
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Beverages, Plant-based foods, Dairy substitutes, Milk substitutes, Nuts and their products, Plant-based beverages, Plant-based milk alternatives, Nut-based drinks, Almond-based drinks
products.labels: Certified B Corporation, No GMOs, Non GMO project
products.facts: ["Made from high-quality almonds, providing a rich source of nutrients.","Almonds require less water to produce compared to dairy milk, making it a more eco-friendly choice.","Free from artificial flavors, preservatives, and added sugars, ensuring a clean ingredient list.","Packaged in recyclable materials, contributing to a reduced environmental footprint."]

products.name: Cheetos Crunchy
products.facts: ["Cheetos Crunchy are made from cornmeal, which is a primary ingredient sourced from corn.","The packaging for Cheetos is designed to be recyclable, promoting better waste management practices.","Cheetos are produced using a puffing process that requires less oil compared to traditional frying methods, reducing fat content.","The product is gluten-free, catering to consumers with gluten sensitivities."]

products.name: Shin ramen
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages,Plant-based foods,Cereals and potatoes,Cereals and their products,Meals,Dried products,Pastas,Dried products to be rehydrated,Noodles,Soups,Instant noodles,Instant noodle soups
products.facts: ["Shin ramen is made from high-quality wheat flour, which is sourced sustainably.","The packaging is designed to be recyclable, reducing its environmental impact.","Shin ramen contains no artificial preservatives, ensuring a cleaner ingredient profile.","The noodles are crafted using a traditional steaming process that enhances their texture and flavor."]

products.name: 28% vegetable oil spread
products.brands: I Can'T Believe It's Not Butter, Unilever
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Plant-based foods, Fats, Spreads, Plant-based spreads, Vegetable fats, Spreadable fats, Margarines, Imitation butter spread, en:salted-spreads
products.labels: No artificial preservatives, No gluten, Keep refrigerated

products.facts: ["Made with 28% vegetable oil, providing a creamy texture and flavor.","Often contains a blend of oils such as canola, palm, and soybean, which may vary by brand.","Typically lower in saturated fat compared to butter, promoting heart health.","Many brands offer eco-friendly packaging and sustainable sourcing of ingredients."]

products.facts: ["Made from corn tortillas, providing a gluten-free snack option.","Typically fried or baked, offering a crunchy texture.","Often packaged in recyclable materials to minimize environmental impact.","Quality ingredients are used to ensure a fresh taste and crispy consistency."]
